name: 30% ruling at high expat income
description: Single expat with 30% ruling earning €90,000 gross in the Netherlands 2026. Taxable income = €63,000 (70%). Salary meets minimum threshold (€48,013 taxable required; €63,000 > threshold).

sources.description: Calculated using official 2026 Dutch tax rates with 30% ruling. Taxable income: €63,000. Tax: 35.75% × €38,883 + 37.56% × €24,117 = €22,959. General credit: €3,115 - 6.398% × (€63,000 - €29,736) = €987. Labour credit (on full gross €90,000): €5,685 - 6.510% × (€90,000 - €45,592) = €2,794. Tax after credits: €19,178.
